game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart by rogue temporal entities known as "Time Reavers". Players take on the role of a Chrono-Guardian, tasked with restoring the timestream and defeating the enigmatic mastermind behind the chaos.
game.beginning: The game begins in the last remnants of a desolate future, where the protagonist awakens with no memory of their past. Guided by a cryptic AI companion, they embark on a journey to repair the timeline, reliving pivotal moments from history and confronting Time Reavers who seek to erase entire eras.
game.ending: As the player progresses through the game, they uncover a sinister plot to harness the power of the timestream for catastrophic purposes. The final showdown takes place at the dawn of time itself, where the Chrono-Guardian must face their greatest challenge yet: a battle against the mastermind and the very fabric of reality. Will the timeline be restored, or will the echoes of eternity fade into oblivion?
